pli-tv-pvr1.8:1.1: Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.8:1.2: Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.8:1.3: Akkhāyite sarīre methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.8:1.4: yebhuyyena khāyite sarīre methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.8:1.5: vaṭṭakate mukhe acchupantaṃ aṅgajātaṃ paveseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa—
pli-tv-pvr1.8:1.6: methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.8:2.1: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ kati vipattiyo bhajanti, sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā, channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti, catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ, sattannaṃ samathānaṃ katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.8:2.2: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr1.8:2.5: siyā pārājikāpattikkhandhena, siyā thullaccayāpattikkhandhena, siyā dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena.
pli-tv-pvr1.8:2.7: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato.
pli-tv-pvr1.8:2.10: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca …pe…. #1
pli-tv-pvr1.8:3.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karonto kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.8:3.2: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karonto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.8:3.4: anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karonto imaṃ ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.8:4.1: Sā āpatti catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ kati vipattiyo bhajati, sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā, channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti, catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ, sattannaṃ, samathānaṃ katihi samathehi sammati?
pli-tv-pvr1.8:4.2: Sā āpatti catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ ekaṃ vipattiṃ bhajati—
pli-tv-pvr1.8:4.7: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato.
pli-tv-pvr1.8:4.10: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca. #2
